traits.name: Explorer
traits.description: Enjoys discovering new areas and learning about unknown territories.

traits.name: Socializer
traits.description: Prefers interacting with others and building social networks.

traits.name: Builder
traits.description: Finds satisfaction in creating structures or crafting items.

traits.name: Leader
traits.description: Naturally takes charge and excels in guiding others.

traits.name: Innovator
traits.description: Loves to come up with new ideas and creative solutions.

goals: Discover a new region of the environment
Resolve a conflict between other agents
Lead a team to complete a project
Make a significant decision for the group
Develop a new technique or method
